review_text: Absolutely fantastic service! My dog always comes back happy and tired, which is exactly what I want. The videos and photos they send during walks are a lovely touch.
Having recently moved to the area, I was worried about finding someone reliable to take care of my dog. Paw Patroller UK has been a godsend!
I love the live streaming walk option! Being able to see my dog having fun while I'm at work really brightens my day.
Very professional service. My dog is always excited to see them arrive. Would definitely recommend!
Trustworthy, reliable and genuinely care about the pets they look after. Worth every penny!
